Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Mansfield Hotel, you'll be centrally located in New York, minutes from International Center of Photography and Grand Central Terminal. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Broadway.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 126 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

International Center of Photography - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
New York Public Library - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Bryant Park - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
NBC Studios - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Grand Central Terminal - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Rockefeller Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Top of the Rock Observation Deck - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Toys 'R' Us Times Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Broadway - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Times Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Patrick's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Minskoff Theater - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Radio City Music Hall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Chrysler Building - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
New Amsterdam Theater - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.4 km / 4 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18 km / 11.2 mi

The preferred airport for The Mansfield Hotel is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for The Mansfield Hotel is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).
